adjective.description: Of or denoting the sex that produces small, typically motile gametes, especially spermatozoa, with which a female may be fertilized or inseminated to produce offspring.

noun.description: A male person, plant, or animal.
examples: the audience consisted of adult males

proper noun.description: The capital of the Maldives; population 111,000 (est. 2007).

origin: Late Middle English: from Old French masle, from Latin masculus, from mas a male.
